item.title: Shortform Video Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Seeking a dynamic short-form video content creator for TikTok, Instagram, and YouTube for @duckeycaps. Create fun, enthusiastic, and highly creative videos for a large company, with opportunities for growth. Must be able to show your face, be very enthusiastic/ highly creative and have a strong desire to create VIRAL short form content. Some examples of content we are looking for are: https://www.youtube.com/@KanpaiFoodz/
https://www.youtube.com/@MiniKatanaStore
https://www.youtube.com/@vat19

Hourly Range: $30.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 18, 2024 18:14 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Film Editing, Scripting, Enthusiastic Tone, Videography, Video Editing
Skills: Film Editing, Scripting, Enthusiastic Tone, Videography, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
